name: 3dAutobox
author: AFNI Team
description: Computes size of a box that fits around the volume. Can also be used to crop the volume to that box.

inputs.description: Crop the input dataset to the size of the box, and write an output dataset with PREFIX for the name. If not used, no new volume is written out.
inputs.name: Prefix name

inputs.description: An alternate way to specify the input dataset.
inputs.name: Alternate input dataset

inputs.description: Don't do any clustering to find the box. Any non-zero voxel will be preserved in the cropped volume.
inputs.name: No clustering flag

inputs.description: Write to standard out the spatial extent of the box.
inputs.name: Extent flag

inputs.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to screen: imin imax jmin jmax kmin kmax.
inputs.name: Extent IJK flag

inputs.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to a simple-formatted text file FF: imin imax jmin jmax kmin kmax.
inputs.name: Extent IJK to file

inputs.description: Write out the 3 ijk midslices of the autobox to the screen: imid jmid kmid.
inputs.name: Extent IJK midslice flag

inputs.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to screen in a particular order and format. Useful for scripting.
inputs.name: Extent IJKORD flag

inputs.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox ijk slice numbers to a file in a particular order and format. Useful for 3dcalc expressions.
inputs.name: Extent IJKORD to file

inputs.description: Write out the 6 auto bbox xyz coordinates to a simple-formatted text file GG: xmin xmax ymin ymax zmin zmax.
inputs.name: Extent XYZ to file

inputs.description: Write out the 3 xyz midslices of the autobox to the screen: xmid ymid zmid.
inputs.name: Extent XYZ midslice flag

inputs.description: Number of extra voxels to pad on each side of box.
inputs.name: Npad

inputs.description: Constrain npad-ded extents to be within dataset.
inputs.name: Npad safety on flag
